remarks: Left cancellation law for vector sum.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmodvacl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvacl.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lmodlcan $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V /\ Z e. V ) ) -> ( ( Z .+ X ) = ( Z .+ Y ) <-> X = Y ) ) $.
